UN agency says aid shipment blocked in Israeli portThe main United Nations agency providing aid to Palestinians in Gaza is facing growing administrative hurdles from Israel, with a shipment amounting to a month's supply of food blocked in port, the agency's chief said. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 16:46:24 GMT NDKF7L5FVZOZNIDI5TPH33VMIM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-agency-says-aid-shipment-blocked-israeli-port-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东
Biden will speak with Netanyahu on Sunday, White House officials sayU.S. President Joe Biden will speak with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday, two White House officials said, in what will be the two leaders' first conversation since Biden said Israel's military response in Gaza has been "over the top." Sun, 11 Feb 2024 16:25:06 GMT 6UECBHPTI5LTVOBU42N3FB7UQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-will-speak-with-netanyahu-sunday-white-house-officials-say-2024-02-11/Andrea Shalal世界
Palestinian president in Qatar to discuss ceasefire effortsPalestinian President Mahmoud Abbas arrived in Doha on Sunday for talks on securing a ceasefire in the Gaza war with the Qatari emir, whose country has been at the heart of mediation efforts and hosts political leaders of militant group Hamas. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 16:18:16 GMT TJP6KLMXGVLPFHVBVEHMFGBSHY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-president-qatar-discuss-ceasefire-efforts-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东
Germany's foreign minister to travel to Israel next weekGermany's Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock will travel to Israel in the middle of next week, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Sunday, a trip in which she said she plans to urge for a ceasefire as Israel prepares to advance on Rafah. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 15:53:14 GMT WQIGKO6RW5LVFCXCUV4EI5UETU https://www.reuters.com/world/germanys-foreign-minister-travel-israel-next-week-2024-02-11/Reuters世界
Netanyahu says 'enough' remaining Israeli hostages alive to warrant Gaza warNetanyahu also said that one Palestinian civilian has been killed for every Hamas fighter killed in Gaza. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 15:29:58 GMT ZQVPWDPPRNKSTG52QJYPQ4X6RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-enough-remaining-israeli-hostages-alive-warrant-gaza-war-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东
Three dead in Senegal protests over delayed presidential electionThe death toll amid protests in Senegal over the postponement of the presidential election until December has climbed to three, as concerns grow that one of the remaining democracies in coup-hit West Africa is under threat. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 15:16:43 GMT XZWKXBOZCZIGFK5GTGG7YRRAEE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ Three-dead-senegal-protests-over-delayed-presidential-election-2024-02-11/Diadie Ba, Ngouda Dione世界非洲
Ukrainian man accused of espionage dies in Russian prisonA 71-year-old Ukrainian man died in Russia in December awaiting trial for espionage and other crimes, human rights organisation Memorial said on Sunday, citing court documents. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:53:45 GMT UHPI6WWJYJI2FCDEDQM42AZDIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-man-accused-espionage-dies- Russian-prison-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Children traumatised by Nepal quake need aid to rebuild lives, UNICEF saysAbout 68,000 children and their families who survived Nepal’s deadliest quake in eight years need further humanitarian aid to rebuild their lives, UNICEF said on Sunday, 100 days after the tremors that devastated parts of west Nepal. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:51:05 GMT GXR63M277JMRXFEFEPBDGRVWAM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/children-traumatized-by-nepal-quake-need-aid-rebuild-lives-unicef-2024-02-11/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Netanyahu says he has not spoken to Biden since 'over the top' remarksIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday he has not spoken to U.S. President Joe Biden since the president made remarks about Israel's military response to Hamas being "over the top." Sun, 11 Feb 2024 14:38:51 GMT 3PD5LWLEXNLU7DZ3WRLG5SSP4U https://www.reuters.com/world/netanyahu-says-he-has-not-spoken-biden-since-over-top-remarks-2024-02-11/Reuters世界
Desperate Gazans in Rafah fear coming Israeli assaultThe Abu Mustafa family's tent is hard against the high concrete and metal fence separating Gaza from Egypt in Rafah, the last relatively safe place in an enclave devastated by Israel's military offensive, but one that may now also come under attack. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 13:44:42 GMT ORJHUFTK3ZMA7O6PYZCYBNTGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/desperate-palestinians-gazas-rafah-fear-coming-israeli-assault-2024-02-11/Mohammad Salem, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Trump's NATO comments draw scorn, White House calls them 'unhinged'Trump said he would encourage Russia to "do whatever the hell they want" if it attacked NATO allies that weren't spending enough on defense. European officials assailed the presidential candidate for his "reckless statements." Sun, 11 Feb 2024 12:39:14 GMT ZK5PBJ2WCZNLXLOXDSL3EGGRSI https://www.reuters.com/world/european-officials-criticize-trumps-nato-comments-2024-02-11/Reuters世界
